price: 50.Kaadu ama mari Nabii Saalic kee kay marih qidimih malseeniih, nanu ken uma malal ken galtennooh ken digaalenno Nabii Saalic qokollaah ken bayisnaamal usun aaxige kalah iyye Yalli.
arabic: وَمَكَرُواْ مَكۡرٗا وَمَكَرۡنَا مَكۡرٗا وَهُمۡ لَا يَشۡعُرُونَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: wamakarū makran wamakarnā makran wahum lā yashʿurūna
